name: Thorn Whip

components.materialDescription: the stem of a plant with thorns

description: You create a vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 Piercing damage, and if it is Large or smaller, you can pull it up to 10 feet closer to you.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

effects.special: On hit, if the target is Large or smaller, you can pull it up to 10 feet closer to you.

engineHook.notes: Requires logic for melee spell attack, damage application, and forced movement (pull).
